intro: Onosma papillosa, commonly known as silky onosma, is a flowering plant native to the Mediterranean region. It is characterized by its soft, hairy leaves and clusters of small, yellowish flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or dry soils and is adapted to arid environments. It belongs to the family Boraginaceae, which includes other plants with similar medicinal properties. Onosma papillosa is often used in traditional herbal medicine for its purported health benefits.
